text: "Aankh Maarey" () is a Hindi-language song, originally composed by Viju Shah and sung by Kumar Sanu and Kavita Krishnamurthy for the 1996 Bollywood film Tere Mere Sapne, as picturized on Arshad Warsi and Simran. The Tere Mere Sapne soundtrack album was released by T-Series and sold 2.2million units in India, making it the sixth best-selling Bollywood soundtrack of 1996. ==2018 version== "Aankh Maarey" was remixed by Tanishk Bagchi for the 2018 film Simmba, with the vocals of Neha Kakkar and Mika Singh. The music video is mainly picturized on the film's leading stars Ranveer Singh and Sara Ali Khan, and features several cameo appearances, including Arshad Warsi (with Kumar Sanu's voice from the original song), who starred in the original film from where the song came. ===Reception=== The song became a major hit, with its video going viral within hours of its release by T-Series on YouTube, where it's received a total of over 1billion views. Between 6 December 2018 to 5 December 2019, it became the first Indian song to cross the milestone of 1.4 billion views on YouTube. == References == Category:Mika Singh songs Category:Neha Kakkar songs Category:Hindi film songs Category:1996 songs Category:Songs written by Tanishk Bagchi
title: Aankh Maarey
